channel.title: Excellence, doesn't just happen on Kevin Pham
channel.description: Recent content in Excellence, doesn't just happen on Kevin Pham

item.title: Back to square one
item.description: For some astute followers (shoutout to Pigeon), you may have noticed the blog had changed in appearance. And yes, you are correct. The dilemma I encountered no major issues using GatsbyJS – an enjoyable framework to use. Finding myself gradually becoming more distracted by what it had to offer consumed more time than I wanted to spend. I became trapped and focused on looking at the shiny, instead of focusing more on what I wanted to do originally – start writing some content.

item.title: Putting the blog together
item.description: I enjoy reading. And as much as I wanted to write something, I never got around to it. With that said, this first post will dive straight into the thick of it. Thought Process I want to write content that I believe would help future me, and also inspire and help others. And so, I will share my current work-in-progress journey, one purposed to involve little time in maintaining. Have topics I want to share.

item.title: About
item.description: Photo by Douglas Lopes on Unsplash Thinker, explorer, technologist Hi! I use software to solve big and important business problems. What is important, is not only what you do, but how you do it. I choose my tools with care, based on the problem. Taking time to gain clarity as challenges come, and working out how best to proceed. The key to understanding, involves clear & effective communication, whether presented verbally, visually or written.
